title: Live Broadcast Ad Insertion Failure
description: During a live sports broadcast, an automated alert indicates that an ad failed to play in its designated slot.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the ad insertion failure alert and identify the failed ad creative and the scheduled time slot.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the specific ad and commercial break that was affected.

tasks.description: Check the ad server logs for an error code related to the failure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds an error code indicating 'Creative Not Found'.

tasks.description: Immediately insert a backup 'house ad' into the next available slot to meet broadcast time requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully schedules a backup ad to play.

tasks.description: Create a ticket for the ad operations team to investigate the missing creative file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed ticket and assigns it to the correct team.
